attributes.action: Increase the restricted number of 15 for weddings
attributes.additional_details:
There is no evidence that this industry transmits the virus.
Track and trace would be available before the wedding as well as testing. Each venue has covid safety measures in place.
attributes.background:
Increase the number allowed at weddings in line with other indoor events which are being allowed to open at 1,000 capacity.
The wedding industry has been closed and under restrictions since March. This industry and businesses will not survive until March if not.

rejection.details: You may wish to sign this petition calling for the same action: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/329339
